channel.title: Teen Health Minute
channel.itunes:author: New Media Conversations
channel.description: Teen Health Minute is a podcast covering teen health issues including stress, skincare, hydration, exercise, diet, and weight control. Each week we will talk about how you can best keep your body healthy for life.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Teen Health Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Teen Health Minute is a podcast covering teen health issues including stress, skincare, hydration, exercise, diet, and weight control. Each week we will talk about how you can best keep your body healthy for life.

item.title: Maintaining High Levels of Energy
item.itunes:author: New Media Conversations
item.itunes:summary: Discuss how to keep your energy levels high throughout the day through small amounts of exercise, proper eating and drinking plenty of water.
item.itunes:keywords: Teen Health energy hydration Exercise eating weight water drink
